Zaire (French: zaïre, koodu ZRZ, ZRN) bụ otu ego nke ndi Democratic Republic of the Congo na nke Republik of Zaire site na afo otu puku nari iteghete iri isii na asaa (1967) ruo otu puku nari iteghete iri itoolu na asaa (1997)
Ha niile ma e wezụga isii n'ime usoro akwụkwọ ego iri asaa Na iteghete e wepụtara nwere onyinyo nke Mobutu Sese Seko
ego abụọ dị iche iche adịla: Zaire (1967-1993, ZRZ), na nouveau zaïre (1993-1998, ZRN).
E webatara Zaire (French), akara: "Z", maọbụ mgbe ụfọdụ "Xia", na 1967, na-anọchi franc Congolese na ọnụego mgbanwe nke otu Zaire = otu puku francs
E kewara zaire n'ime otu nari ego (otu: likuta, akara: "K"), nke ọ bụla n'ime otu narị sengi (ihe nnọchianya: "s")
Otú ọ dị, sengi bara uru nke ukwuu ma naanị mkpụrụ ego sengi a kpọrọ aha bụ mkpụrụ ego iri sengi nke e wepụtara na afo 1967
N'ụzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe maka ego ọ bụla, ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị ide ego na zeros atọ mgbe ọnụọgụ iri gasịrị, ọbụlagodi mgbe ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa mere ka ego ahụ belata nke ukwuu
Mmụba nke ọnụ ahịa mesịrị mee ka ewepụta akwụkwọ ego ruru 5,000,000 zaires, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e webatara zaire ọhụrụ.
E webatara zaire na ubicuo 23 Juun n’afo 1967, na ọnụego nke otu zaire = otu puku Congolese francs = otu nari Belgian francs
Nke a na-enye ọnụego mgbanwe nke US $ abuo 2 kwa zaire.
